get.description: Root endpoint

post.description:
Login endpoint for local authentication.

Creates access token (sent to frontend) and refresh token (stored in HTTP-only cookie).
Works for all login types: local, Google, Microsoft.

Refresh access token using refresh token from HTTP-only cookie.

This endpoint reads the refresh_token from cookies and issues a new access token.

get.description: Get current authenticated user information

post.description:
Logout endpoint.

Clears refresh token cookie (stateless - no database revocation needed).

get.description: Generate SSO redirect URL with token for specific services

parameters.name: role

schema.description: User role: admin, doctor, or staff
schema.title: Role

parameters.description: User role: admin, doctor, or staff

post.description:
Decrypt the onboarding token to get user_id and email.
Used for clinic onboarding links.

get.description:
Initiate Google OAuth flow.
Can be used for both connection and login.

Handle Google OAuth callback.
Creates IMS tokens and sets refresh token cookie.

post.description:
Connect Google account to existing user.
Used when user clicks 'Connect with Google' from onboarding email.

Disconnect Google account from user.
User can only use password authentication after this.

get.description: Check if user has Google account connected

Initiate Microsoft OAuth flow.
Can be used for both connection and login.

Handle Microsoft OAuth callback.
Creates IMS tokens and sets refresh token cookie.

post.description:
Connect Microsoft account to existing user.
Used when user clicks 'Connect with Microsoft' from onboarding email.

Disconnect Microsoft account from user.
User can only use password authentication after this.

get.description: Check if user has Microsoft account connected

post.description:
Create a new clinic with admin user.
Requires superadmin access.

get.description: Get all clinics with their assigned integrations and forms. Requires superadmin access.

put.description: Update clinic details and access. Requires superadmin access.

delete.description: Delete a clinic (CASCADE will handle related records). Requires superadmin access.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific clinic. Requires superadmin access.

post.description: Resend onboarding email to a user. Requires superadmin access.

get.description: Get detailed dashboard statistics
Get integrations and forms accessible to the current user
Get analytics data for superadmin
Get all integrations and forms for a specific clinic

Proxy endpoint to fetch list of clinics with Google Calendar stats from external backend.
Returns clinics list with pagination support.

Proxy endpoint to fetch Google Calendar logs for a specific clinic by phone number.
Returns logs with pagination support.

Proxy endpoint to fetch transcript for a specific call.
Returns transcript data.
Get users - superadmin sees all, clinic_admin sees only their clinic
Get specific user by ID

delete.description: Deactivate (soft delete) a user - only superadmin

get.description: Get current admin profile

post.description:
Request password reset - sends email with reset link.
No authentication required.
Reset password using encrypted user ID - HIPAA compliant (no token storage)

get.description: Verify encrypted user ID and return user info

post.description:
Generate encrypted token for onboarding password setup.
Used when new users need to set their initial password.

get.description: Get all Twilio numbers with optional filtering

schema.title: Response Get Twilio Numbers Api Twilio  Get

get.description: Get available (unassigned) Twilio numbers for clinic onboarding

schema.title: Response Get Available Twilio Numbers Api Twilio Available Get

post.description:
Create or update total time for an agent.
If agent_id exists, add to existing duration.
No authentication required - called by other services.

get.description:
Server-Sent Events endpoint for real-time duration updates.
Clients connect once and receive live updates when call durations change.
